title: LUFFY VS GOD ENEL! One Piece Episode 182, 183 & 184 REACTION + REVIEW
author: Unknown
description: A reaction and review video covering Episodes 182-184, featuring the epic battle between Luffy and Enel.

spoilerWarning.spoilerDescription: Contains spoilers through the conclusion of the Luffy vs Enel battle

title: 182: 'They Finally Clash! Pirate Luffy vs God Eneru!' Review
author: neverwatchedonepiece
description: A detailed blog review of Episode 182, praising Conis and Luffy as standouts and describing the joy of watching Luffy counter Enel's powers. The reviewer mentions watching the last five minutes four times.

title: Luffy vs Enel, Luffy is immune to lightning (One piece ep 182)
author: Unknown
description: A video clip highlighting the key moment from Episode 182 where Luffy's rubber immunity to Enel's lightning is demonstrated.

spoilerWarning.spoilerDescription: Shows the pivotal moment of Luffy's lightning immunity reveal

title: #738 Luffy vs Enel - Enels hilarious reaction !!
author: Unknown
description: A video clip focusing on Enel's shocked and comedic reactions when he discovers his lightning attacks don't work on Luffy.

spoilerWarning.spoilerDescription: Shows Enel's reaction to discovering Luffy's immunity

title: #737 Luffy Finally Meets Enel !!
author: Unknown
description: A video clip showing the moment when Luffy finally confronts Enel for the first time.

spoilerWarning.spoilerDescription: Shows the initial confrontation between Luffy and Enel
